column1: The '''Ered Lithui''', or the '''Ash Mountains''', was a mountain range on the northern border of [[Mordor]] which separated it from [[Rhovanion]]. It ran about 500 miles from east to west. One south-western ridge divided the [[Plateau of Gorgoroth]] from [[Lithlad]]. A shorter southern spur within Gorgoroth ended at [[Barad-dûr]]. The west end of the Ash Mountains met the [[Ephel Dúath
